column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I used to love his place
column2: but became disappointed during my last visit. I don't know if it had anything to do with the fact that it was a Sunday evening. Service was ok
column3: but the food didn't taste fresh. We ordered a paella
column4: which they used to make upon your order and serve it with the pan. This time they brought the rice on a plate; it seemed like it had been cooked a while ago and they just cooked the pork and mixed it up. Even worse
column5: I took a bite of a piece of pork and thought it was probably undercooked
column6: but I just kept telling myself "nah
column7: it's just a bit of the fat". Well
column8: I got soooo sick later that night I regretted not spitting it out when the thought first crossed my mind.
